snippet: Kathy Steiner-Lang, the director of the Office for International Students and Scholars at Washington University of St. Louis, advises students to make their travel arrangements this month to prepare for college in the United States.
abstract: Kathy Steiner-Lang, the director of the Office for International Students and Scholars at Washington University of St. Louis, advises students to make their travel arrangements this month to prepare for college in the United States.

headline.main: For Incoming International Students, a College Checklist for June
